price: ߊ߲ ߞߊ߬ ( ߞߎߟߎ߲ ) ߏ߬ ߟߋ ߕߏ߫ ߕߐ߰ߡߊ߬ߛߙߋ߬ߦߊ ߟߊ߫ ߸ ߕߊ߰ߛߌ߬ߓߊ߯ ߘߌ߫ ߛߐ߬ߘߐ߲߫ ߏ߬ ߘߐ߫ ߓߊ߬؟
arabic: وَلَقَد تَّرَكۡنَٰهَآ ءَايَةٗ فَهَلۡ مِن مُّدَّكِرٖ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: walaqad taraknāhā āyatan fahal min muddakirin
